specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric. Yarn Effect > Worsted Yarn Worsted is a high-quality type of wool yarn, typically made from long-staple pasture wool. It is commonly used in the production of tailored garments, such as suits. In tropical-weight worsteds, tightly spun and straightened wool, combined with a looser weave, allows for better airflow through the fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Recommended Use Coats
